    • Constructor Detail

      • Task

        public Task​(java.lang.String title,
            Date startingDate,
            Date deadline,
            double estimatedTime,
            Requirement relatedRequirement)
        Constructor for the Task class.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the task.
        startingDate - The task's starting date as a Date object.
        deadline - The task's deadline as a Date object.
        estimatedTime - The estimated time for the task to be finished.
        relatedRequirement - The Requirement object which the task is related to.

      • assignTeamMember

        public void assignTeamMember​(TeamMember teamMember)
        Method to assign a team member to the task's list of team members. Also assigns a team member to the requirement's list of team members if necessary.
        Parameters:
        teamMember - The TeamMember object which will be added to the list.

      • unassignTeamMember

        public void unassignTeamMember​(TeamMember teamMember)
        Method to unassign a team member from the task's list of team members.
        Parameters:
        teamMember - The TeamMember object which will be removed from the list.

      • addHoursWorked

        public void addHoursWorked​(TeamMember teamMember,
                           double hoursWorked)
        Method to modify the task's TimeRegistration with a specified amount of hours worked. This method also modifies the specified team member's amount of hours worked.
        Parameters:
        teamMember - The team member who worked on the task.
        hoursWorked - The amount of hours the team member worked on the task.

      • edit

        public void edit​(java.lang.String title,
                 double estimatedTime,
                 Date startingDate,
                 Date deadline,
                 Status status,
                 TeamMember responsibleTeamMember,
                 double hoursWorked,
                 TeamMember teamMember)
        Method to modify a task's details with the given values.
        Parameters:
        title - The new task title.
        estimatedTime - The new estimated time in hours.
        startingDate - The task's new start date.
        deadline - The task's new deadline.
        status - The new status of the task.
        responsibleTeamMember - The new responsible team member for the task.
        hoursWorked - The amount of hours of work (if any) to register.
        teamMember - The team member (if any) to register time for.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Standard overridden Object equals() method that checks everything.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to compare with.
        Returns:
